About Me

My journey as a software developer. . .

BIO

I am a current University of Cincinnati student, expecting to graduate in December of 2020 with a bachelors in Sports Administration and a minor in marketing. I have been passionate about coding and web development since September of 2019, and I am comfortably familiar with HTML, CSS and the SASS framework, and Javascript( including NodeJS, JQuery, and the React library).
